content.webTitle: Tweet the People: What would you ask Obama at tonight's press conference?

fields.headline: Tweet the People: What would you ask Obama?
fields.bodyText: Here's our Twitter topic of the day: After hitting the road to drum up public support for his economic stimulus plan, Barack Obama heads back to Washington for his first televised prime-time press conference. If you were a member of the White House press corps, what would you ask the US president? Share your thoughts by sending us a response on our GuardianUS Twitter page. You can do this by logging on to your Twitter account, typing @GuardianUS and then your comment of 140 characters or less. Of course, you can always comment on this blog post. Thank you for contributing.
